channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Thompson Road East Dulwich is full of huge weeds on the pavements and roads - we have been told that the weeds will be removed like other roads but nothing has happened - please can it urgently be dealt with, 8th October
item.description:
Thompson Road in East Dulwich is filled with huge weeds - pavements and in the road - we have told they will be removed - like other streets - but nothing has happened / please can it be urgently and thoroughly be dealt with - many thanks Thompson Road, East Dulwich
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Thompson Road, East Dulwich, London
